name: Patch-12
description:
You play as Patch-12, a cyborg out to defeat the waves of Droids.
Health and ammo share the same resource, killing enemies restores that resource. So MAKE IT COUNT!

Team Name: 

NoSleepGang

Content that was created before the jam: 

All but the enemy sounds are from Soundly

UE4 skybox

Move: WASD
Attack: Left Click
Shoot: Left Click (while aiming)
Aim: Right Click
Change Bullet Type: Scroll Wheel
Run: Shift
Dodge: Ctrl
Jump: Space
